name: John Sabrina
description:
I am john from canada have given up on looking for love… but I still have hope it will find me…If you are in love, don’t be afraid to show it. You never know, the way you show it might get you what you love…Treat me like an angel, and I’ll show you what heaven’s real….am scare of women bcs I love and trust easily I believe trust is love the more I know about u then I will get to know how open ur mind is to me ….write me back about u…am single 61years old am from Canada I work with a private modeling country…I believe if there is love and understand no journey or miles is too far away to go..
I want it to take your breath away every time I say, “I love you” because you know it’s coming from the heart.I want us to sit down with a box of strawberries, a bottle of chocolate syrup, and a thing of mint chocolate ice cream; well, I’ll let your imagination finish that one. I want to love you and be with you for forever. I couldn’t really express in words what I’m feeling right now so I decided to share with you SOME of the images and thoughts that have been running through my head
